# Energy consumtion of european countries

## get Data from github
```{r}
data<-read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SvenjaDo/MB12/master/data/day2_data_energy_prod_EU_2020-08-03_2020-08-09.csv",sep=",",header=T)
```

## explore data:
```{r}
head(data)
```

```{r}
plot(ActualConsumption~Day,data=data)
boxplot(data$ActualConsumption~data$Day)

plot(data$ActualGenerationOutput[data$MapCode=='NIE'])

plot(data$ActualGenerationOutput)

```
